stories.title: Experiments in the Revival of Organisms – Russian Dog Head Experiment [video]

stories.text:
We made a site to control who sees our explainer video while raising (the video showed critical UX insights). Would this be useful for anyone here?

- Fresh link generator for any person/group/purpose

- Video can't be downloaded (can be screen recorded of course)

- Ability to turn on/off the link, ban IPs, and see how many time people watch it (we've shut a few links off that got >100 views within a couple days)

What it looks like (very simple): https://imgur.com/a/pLCdNvT
